item.title: torrent
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
torrential downpour, strong gales
  unabated for days and days
cool respite from the scorching heat
  a harbinger of climate change

item.title: liquefy
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
a late afternoon —
     chocolate and vanilla
        cool delicious chocobar

but lo and behold —
     misfortune befalls
        the ice-cream falls

liquefied dessert —
     will now be eaten
        by a simian

item.title: flames
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
orange flames above —
providing cool respite from
the sweltering sun
